data.text: @mandi_hinrichs @LoneRook Thank you. I'm finally coming over the hill. Nearly went to the hospital twice over the weekend, but we got through, thank God.
@RachelSL @LoneRook I’m so, so sorry! I hope your symptoms are mild and that you feel better soon. ♥️

@druzif @LoneRook Yeah, I still have the day-job to do, too, in addition to the crazy kids. But, thank GOD Matthew is on the upswing, so the last two days he's been able to do more with the kids, and that has been a HUGE help!

@RachelSL @LoneRook I know how guilty we get as writers that we should be working constantly. Sometimes you gotta stay in bed and REST. And I’ve not got kids so I could rest up, so I’m sending ALL the positive vibes your way

@druzif @LoneRook Thanks, Drew. I am trying. Being immunocompromised, it's always interesting riding out illnesses, but this is DEFINITELY easier than the first time I had COVID in February 2020. So, huzzah vaxx/boost!
@is_yenice @LoneRook Çok çalışmayı umursamıyorum ama iyileşmeyi yavaşlatıyor. Teşekkür ederim.

@RachelSL @LoneRook Take care hun. I didn’t have any symptoms with my covid (other than the worst migraine ever), but just the whole experience left me miserable and drained. So stay connected and look after yourself x
@RachelSL @LoneRook Minik kızınız çok düşünceliyim.Umarız iylesirsiniz en kısa zamanda.Gördüğüm kadarıyla eviniz hemde işinizde mukemmeliyetcisiniz.Rachel.unutma kendine de zaman ayirmalisin.
@SuzanneGriffin1 @LoneRook Thank you, Suzanne. ❤️ Working on it!
@RachelSL @LoneRook So sorry, Rachel!  Hope you will be feeling better very soon! ❤️
